text: Re romeletse baromuoa ba Rona ka Lits’upiso tse Hlakileng le hona ho ba senolela Lengolo le molao, hore batho ba tle ba phethahatse toka; U senotse ts’epe e nang le matla a ts’abehang le melemo e mengata molemong oa batho, hore Allah A tle A tsebe ba mo thusang ‘moho le baromuoa ba hae sephiring. Hobane Allah U Matla Oohle, U Matla a hlollang
